page.syntax: New_String as C = *WORD_REPLACE(text as c,insert as c,word as n,separator as c[,nwords as n])

argument.name: word
argument.description: The number of the first word to replace. Numeric

argument.name: nwords
argument.description: Optional. Default = 1. The number of words to replace. Numeric

page.description: Replace word(s) of text at word position (1 word replaced if ommitted).
page.discussion: The *WORD_REPLACE() function replaces one or more words in a list.
page.example: ? *word_replace("one two three four","THREE!!",3," ") = "one two THREE!! four" ? *word_replace("one two three four","TWO AND THREE",2," ",2) = "one TWO AND THREE four"
